actions.description: The swan makes two attacks with its beak.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Beak

specialTraits.description: The swan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
specialTraits.name: Keen Sight
